resources.string: This allows you to link MediaPortal functions to keys on your input devices. You could for example assign VolumeUp/Down to '+' and '-' on your keyboard if you don't have volume keys on your keyboard.
This allows you to link MediaPortal configuration and setup screens to a key of your input device for quick access.
This allows you to link MediaPortal menu screens to keys on your input device for quick access. For example you could define 'F2' on your keyboard to open the 'News' screen.
Press a button on the input device you would like to configure.
See the current mappings and select an item to change the mapping.
Press the desired key combination on the input device!
Note that the chosen key mapping will overwrite any existing mappings!
